job_description:
Role: Senior Developer-Java

Location: Remote

Duration: 6-12+ Months

Job Description
The candidate must be able to participate actively within an English or French technical discussion, Ideally French since the candidate would interact with French native developers, most of them are also relatively fluent in English too but it is not the mother tongue.
The candidate is located in America (South or North) to be in a similar time zone as we are: El Salvador, Guatemala or US.
The candidate will be subject to a technical interview and exam as we would do for any candidate that we would directly hire as an employee.
The candidate would be hired for a period of at least 6 month, ideally one year.
The candidate must be of at least an intermediate level of experience. The candidate must also demonstrate a good level of autonomy. He must be able to handle all the phases of a project, from zero to complete, requirements will be well defined.
The candidate must demonstrate very good analytical skills.
The candidate will be working mainly using TypeScript with Node.JS. There might be some Javascript too.
The candidate must have a good knowledge of SQL, the MySQL favor ideally. This is an important
The candidate would work on backend code. He will be asked to do analysis, code development, testing (unit, system), documentation and code review just like any of our developers.
The candidate must be used to working with GIT.
The candidate will have to use the Atlassian tool suite (Jira, Bitbucket and Confluence).
The candidate will be working in an (almost) agile environment.
Thanks,

Bhargav Chakrapani

Sr. IT Recruitment Executive

Zortech Solutions Inc.

25 Watline Avenue | Mississauga, ON L4Z 2Z1

Cell: 707-820-7093

Email: bhargav@zortechsolutions.ca| Website: www.zortechsolutions.ca
